author: gstein
msg: Small tweaks for stricter compilation, and compensate for some APR header
rearrangement. Fixed a small bug in svn_wc__do_property_merge().
* include/svn_hash.h: add APR headers for APR types used in file
* include/svn_io.h: add APR headers for APR types used in file
since the RHS is actually const.
apr_initialize/apr_terminate. group APR includes and use < >
apr_initialize/apr_terminate. group APR includes and use < >
check_explicit_length, try_explicit_length) add const to an argument
apr_initialize/apr_terminate. group APR includes and use < >
* libsvn_subr/tets/hashdump-test.c: remove key, f, and err globals, moving
them into the appropriate functions. add const to 'review' global.
apr_err and components_added to prevent shadowing of outer decl. minor
* libsvn_wc/entries.c: (handle_start_tag) add const to 'nstr' local variable
since the RHS can/should be const.
(close_file): add const to 'diff_args' since the values are const. remove
inner decl of 'apr_err' which shadowed an outer decl
'time' to prevent shadowing of a global 'time' symbol.
prevent shadowing of a global 'wait' symbol.
* libsvn_wc/log.c: (run_cmd_in_directory) add const to 'args' argument to
match expectation of apr_create_process() (and remove cast). fix typos
'full_reject_path' to prevent shadowing of outer decl. fix bug in error
condition which used reject_path->data, yet reject_path is NULL; correct
apr_initialize/apr_terminate. group APR includes and use < >
* tests-common/svn_test_editor.c: (test_delete) add a const to 'Aname' since
(add_or_replace_dir) add a const to 'Aname' and 'ancestor' since RHS
(test_apply_textdelta) add a const to 'Aname' since RHS may be const
(add_or_replace_file) add a const to 'Aname' and 'ancestor' since RHS

author: gstein
msg: * (SVN_RO_DAV_PROP, SVN_RW_DAV_PROP): [new] macros to ease construction of

author: kfogel
msg: (main): handle all ways of asking for help consistently -- the option
way and the command way, either one possibly followed further

author: kfogel
msg: (main): Allow subcommand to be interleaved like any other argument.
Inline all handling of conditions where user needs to see help msg.

author: kfogel
msg: (main): if see valfile, read value right away, don't defer.
have been set in main no matter what.
